OOC: This is as much an over view of events as they stand, as it is a 
post=
. I hope it helps you Jd. I wrote it kinda fast, so I hope you 
can follow =
it)

The battle that stands before the optics of all is truly huge! 

On on=
e side is this battle is what will one day be known as mount St 
Hillary an=
d buried in its side is the Ark, the core and strength of 
the Maximals and=
 Autobots of even this century. However at this 
moment the ark is not visi=
ble covered as it is by some ball of ebony 
darkness that obscures the imme=
diate area - A darkness that for the 
moment appears to defy or at least hi=
nder the probing of sensors and 
communications in and out. Strangely enoug=
h, despite its inhibitive 
effects the darkness appears to have a definite =
Unicronian signature 
to it. It is into this darkness that Kup has flown, a=
nd so far has 
not been heard from!

Near to the ark, just outside the dark=
ness a shuttle - Maximal by 
design - is firing blasts into the air in the =
hopes of defending the 
enshrouded ark against the onslaught of minions in =
the air! Nearby 
stand two defenders, Grimlock and Lord Elder who much like=
 the 
shuttle are firing into the air!

On the otherside of the battle are =
the Predicons and the Decepticons, 
who appear to actually defending the ar=
k as well! Hydras, Darkhawk 
and Perceptor have recently arrived on the sce=
ne, and are sending 
tremendous amounts of fire power into the seemingly un=
ending supply 
of minions that have swooped out of the skies! 

Above them =
all are the minions, sweeps of Scourge and Cyclonus, 
terminators of all th=
ings Cybertroninan =96 Autobot and Decepticon 
alike! They are commanded no=
t by Decepticons but by the word of 
Unicron, and their commanders Cyclonus=
 and Scourge. The sweeps strike 
and attack, like killer bees on some unsus=
pecting prey! Decibel a 
minion lieutenant, who took damage from Hydras' la=
st attack screams 
in pain as she unleashes a viscous sonic attack of her o=
wn, the sound 
of her pain becoming a sonic cone of destructive waves!

In =
the midst of all of this Jhiaxus and Myrmidon are flying, 
attacking these =
flying menaces with ever ounce of strength pulsating 
through their systems=
. Myrmidon has spiraled to the ground smoke 
coming from several hits, and =
yet he still continues to fight on even 
as Jhiaxus fights desperately to s=
tay in the air!

On the ground just behind the battle lines beneath them Sc=
orponok 
fights a massive battle, as fusion powered blasts erupt into the a=
ir 
scorching several sweeps and yet these are only replaced by still 
more=
 as they seek to separate him from his mortal spark. 

And yet at the very =
center of all this, surrounded by a seeming storm 
of sweeps are two figure=
s, fighting it out, locked in some battle 
that none of the sweeps dare to =
enter: Cyclonus and Rodimus! Cyclonus 
appears to be taller, more powerful =
then he was of old, his palms 
glow as he watches his foe carefully. Rodimu=
s appears different as 
well - His frame rather than its bright fiery red a=
ppears much 
darker, almost black, and the wicked gleam from his optic is v=
ery 
different from the one that many Maximals would recognize. 

It is int=
o this conflagration of war and destruction that Shard has 
stumbled. And a=
s he does so several sweeps - who appear to have 
noticed his appearance - =
turn toward him in mid air, with eerily 
syncretus movements, several red d=
ot `painting' Shard as they do so! 

OOC: Jd, if you want Shard to fire aft=
er Kup, that's cool. However as 
of the last update he is inside that big b=
lack ball of Darkness that 
is surrounding the Ark and is not visible. I le=
ave it up to you as to 
what you want to do. Lord Elder and Grimlock are bo=
th on the Maximal 
side, as is that shuttle, but there are few other Maxima=
ls or 
Autobots visible at the moment, unless you want to count Rodimus or =

there are some I have forgotten. 

Shard might notice that the entire batt=
le seems aimed not at Maximals 
vs Predicons but against the sweeps that ar=
e dropping down on 
everyone from above, and seem intent upon destruction!
=

Preston
